entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.summary:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:
YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MAR...

entry.title: Odra 0.0.1 has been released!
entry.summary:
We want to introduce you to the very first release of Odra Framework proudly!
Writing smart contracts have never been easier!
Odra is a high-level smart contract framework for Rust, which encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. Built by experienced developers, it takes care of much of the hassle of smart contract development, enabling you to focus on writing your dapp withou...
